name: myprefix/richtext-multiline
title: RichText Multiline
description: Allows the blocks to contain multiple line. Hitting Return starts a new line in the same block, rather than creating a new block (compare with core/paragraph block).).

content._comment 1: // Can use type: array, with source: children
content._comment 2: // Selector should match RichText.Content tagName in the save function, the edit function RichText tagName can be different.
